name: AcdTol _E_1to5
description: Acid soil tolerance-BY-AcdTol  Estimation-IN-1-5 TOL scale

property.name: Acid soil tolerance
property.description: An assessment of the plants tolerance to acid soil.

method.name: AcdTol  Estimation
method.description: Observe the growth of plants per plot/entry in a low pH (acid) soil field and rate the tolerance.

variableTypes.name: Trait
variableTypes.description: Characteristics of a germplasm to be recorded during a study.
